data.text: @CynthiaMcFadden @NBCNightlyNews Here is our response to tonight‘s #SOTU that completely failed to mention #LongCovid https://t.co/gKf5tJdsZm

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews Theres many many reasons I haven’t even got into here why your plan sets a dangerous prescient. Do I want everyone to be able to get a vaccine tomorrow, globally? Yes. But there are many many barriers that need addressing. And until that’s done, what you’re proposing is harmful.

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews Her husband is anti-mask, anti-vax. He wouldn’t let her. So one day when she was supposed to get groceries. She called me. I dropped her for her vaccine & then got her groceries while she did that, so he wouldn’t know. I am holding her vaccine paper for her so he doesn’t find out

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews We haven’t even talked about other situations. I have a friend who had a few of us on speed dial. She’s working on getting out of a domestic situation but is still working on a safety plan to leave. Which yeah is super important. We have a friend who was killed leaving.

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews Speaking of moms, where I live the govt says anyone between the ages of 5 and 12 can only go to a govt run clinic. Open M-F 9-5. Do you know how many parents I know desperately want that for their kids but can’t get time off?

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews She ended up on a ventilator. But endocarditis is one of the conditions where you can’t have the vaccine. So she hasn’t had shot 2 or 3. But she needs to work. She’s a Black single mum. So she goes to work and hopes no one gets her sick.

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews And then there’s other factors you haven’t considered. A friend got covid between her first and second shot. She got endocarditis. She’s a single mom. Lots of jobs. No her first shot wasn’t as soon as mine. Getting in was a nightmare. When she got sick (from work) she got it bad.

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews When walk in appointments became available, you could do that but waits were hours long. Have an extra hour and a half today? Go wait in line and hope you don’t have to leave today before you get through (I’ve been there trying to access services).

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews How do I know? Because around the time I started developing covid complications vaccines started coming available. I had to sit on that same phone line waiting. You don’t have time for that when working multiple jobs.

@grantpa_7 @CTMmpls @CynthiaMcFadden @colocha_rachel @NBCNightlyNews For a long time we could book primarily on the internet. Not everyone has access. And rural folks where I live have very little access. Which left govt phone lines with actual 6 hour waits as they also were intake for covid testing and medical help.
